description.narrative: Sonar Music SA?s pilot project aims to create a space where young people can find connection and community through the medium of music. The project will also focus on youth leadership and developing youth leaders in the community starting with the music club and the management of all the activities. We hope for the project to address many of the issues facing young people in the Hilton and Sweetwaters community. Some of these issues include unemployment, gender inequality, poor self-image and low self-confidence. The main target group is young people between the ages of 13 and 18 which falls into the South African category of High School. The project will run from February 2022 until November 2022. Embracing the change triangle, the project aims to create high quality activities that are run by the young people and volunteers and that focus on the real needs of the target group.
